subSubSection.paragraph:
Hexophthalma albospinosa
have been collected in the Succulent Karoo biome, by pitfall traps and by hand from under rocks and old roofing tin.

Hexophthalma albospinosa
is distributed along the southern coastal areas of Namibia ( Fig. 25 ).
